bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all ni 䘌 , hidden worms, diseases manifesting themselves with diarrhea. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 2: 又有病䘌下不止者，烏頭二兩，女葳、雲實各一兩，桂二 分，蜜丸如桐子，水服五丸，一日三服 , “Also, in the case of the disease of incessant hidden-worms discharge : wu tou 2 liang ; nü wei and yun shi 1 liang each; gui 2 fen . Prepare pills with honey, the size of tong seeds. Ingest five pills with water. Three doses every day”.
